channel.title: Character Files Wont Save, but there are Character files in data folder?
channel.description: dont know what is going on or how to fix it.. i have character files in the data folder and the bin folder.. but every time i log out of my account it starts it all over. how do i fix this please and thank you in advanced!

item.title: Character Files Wont Save, but there are Character files in data folder?
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

I thought when he said there are character files that he means it is creating new character files when he makes new accounts. OP: post if you get an error in your cmd on logout or login

Read full topic
item.source: Character Files Wont Save, but there are Character files in data folder?

item.title: Character Files Wont Save, but there are Character files in data folder?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Dan0194, post:3, topic:544217”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=663098.msg4431670#msg4431670 date=1403525307]
This happened with a source I was working on for a while, it can be anywhere that this problem is happening, but I couldn’t retrace it, so I just abandoned the source. What revision are you using?

Post your PlayerSave.java to Pastebin and post a link here.
[/quote]
It can’t be anywhere he says the saving is all fine so he should check where it loads his character file.[/quote]

F A Y D:

dont know what is going on or how to fix it… i have character files in the data folder and the bin folder… but every time i log out of my account it starts it all over. how do i fix this please and thank you in advanced!

Where does he state that the saving is fine? He says that there’s character files in the data and bin folders, doesn’t mean that it’s saving, it could just be creating files. But yes, if it’s not saving, the next step is loading.

Read full topic
